name: Verify the Weather Hover screen details with Main page details
id: stories/fp/weather/Weather.story;Verify the Weather Hover screen details with Main page details

testSteps.description: Retrive the values from Tokens / Weather article

children.description: Given Login to the Frontpage Admin
And Do a search for an article 'Tokens / Weather'
And Retrieve the description,notice,tokens,condition info from the article

testSteps.description: Given Login to the FP Application as recognized user

children.description: Verify edit icon on hover screen
Verify city name on hover screen
Verify full forecast icon on hover screen
Verify temp date time on hover screen
Verify temp dew point on hover screen
Verify temp image on hover screen
Verify temp humidity on hover screen
Verify temp winds on hover screen

testSteps.description: Then Edit zip code and verify weather page
And User redirect to the Frontpage application
